Row.Text: Cothon
A unique harbor for cathage that can only be obtained through the unique ability. Provides a free Quinquereme and costs no maintenance, has the same bonuses as a normal harbor.
A unique harbor for cathage that can only be obtained through the unique ability. Provides a free Quinquereme and costs no maintenance, has the same bonuses as a normal harbor.

The Cothon was a harbor divided into two parts, a rectangular merchant harbor and a inner more secure and protected harbor which only purpose was military usage. Wiki link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cothon
All coastal Cities get a free Cothon.
